title: Open Admits
description: An Ivy League admissions consultancy site offering AI-powered profile evaluation, personalized mentorship, extracurricular planning, and interview prep.
challenge: Designing a clean, trust-building interface with custom iconography, stat counters, and integrated lead-capture forms.
solution: Crafted a responsive Next.js site with Tailwind, built custom SVG-based icons, and integrated Formik for booking calls directly from the hero section.
